subject: Thank's to Mike Colletta
author: bhali333
full_text:
I would like to sincerely thank Mike Colletta for having me as a guest 
on his paranormal radio show.

He is a great suporter of box research and a brilliant technical 
inventor in his own rite.

We all owe him a debt of gratitude for bringing the box research out to 
the public forefront.

Thanks Mike your a great guy.

Bruce
